name: George Foreman's KO Boxing
overview: You're "Big George" Foreman - the people's champion - and you've got an appetite for big action that only KO BOXING can satisfy. IT's a full menu of hard-hitting, real-ring action. Take on a roster of heavyweight contenders as you go for the World Championship. Rock your opponents with stinging left-right combos and pound your way to the title with a spectacular "Big George" Super Punch - while the computer "judge" tracks the action! GEORGE FOREMAN'S KO BOXING puts the power of the greatest knockout artist in your hands!
